text: Effective date: July 31, 2019
label: Policy Change

text: Welcome to use Daily Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Daily Technology") products (including but not limited to websites, mobile clients) and services!
"Daily Science and Technology" attaches great importance to your privacy.
Therefore, we have formulated a privacy policy covering, using, disclosure, transfer, and storing your information.
The following is the types of personal information we may collect and some examples of how we use this information. The main points are as follows:

We will explain one by one to our personal information types and its corresponding uses so that you can understand the category, use reasons and collection methods of the specific personal information collected for a specific function.

When you use some functions, we will collect some of your sensitive information after obtaining your consent. For example, when you use the "address book recommendation friends" function, we will collect some of your mobile phone contact information, you are inWhen using the "distance me" function, we will use your location information locally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use some functions, we will collect some of your sensitive information after getting your consent.

text: Unless it is collected in accordance with the requirements of relevant laws and regulations, refusing to provide this information will only make you unable to use relevant features, but it does not affect your normal use of "daily science and technology" services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Refusing to provide sensitive personal information, it is not only necessary to use relevant specific functions, and does not affect the use of other services. Except for other provisions of laws and regulations.

text: "Daily Science and Technology" will not share or transfer your personal information to a third party outside "Daily Science and Technology". If you need us to share or transfer your personal information to a third party outside the "Daily Technology",We will directly or confirm that the third party obtains your consent of the above behavior. In addition, we will evaluate the risk of providing information on the outside world.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will not share or transfer your personal information until the third party. If you ask for sharing or transfer, we will confirm in advance that the third party has obtained your consent and conducts the risk assessment provided by the information.

text: You can access, correct, and delete your personal information through this guide, or you can withdraw consent, cancel account number, complain report, and set privacy functions.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can access, correct, and delete your personal information through this guide, or you can withdraw consent, cancel account number, complain report, and set privacy functions.

text: The following is some examples of non -personal information we may collect and how we use this information.

text: If we use non -personal information with personal information, such information will be regarded as personal information during the combination of use.
Cookie and other technologies

"Daily Science and Technology" websites, online services, interactive application software, emails and advertisements may use "cookie" and other technologies, such as pixel labels and website letter marks.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: "Daily Science and Technology" products and advertisements may use "Cookie" and other technologies.

text: These technologies help us better understand the behavior of users, tell us what parts of our websites have been browsed, measuring the effects of advertising and online search and improvement.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: "Cookie" and other technologies are used to understand user behavior.

text: We will pass the information collected by, cookies, and other technologies as non -personal information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Risk
rewrite: We will be regarded as non -personal information collected through cookies and other technologies.

text: However, if local laws are general, internet, protocol, (IP), address, or similar identification marks are deemed as personal information, we also regard these identification marks as personal information.
label: Important
rewrite: If local laws regard the Internet protocol (IP) address or similar identification mark as personal information, we also regard these identification marks as personal information.

text: Similarly, as far as the privacy policy is concerned, in the case of combining non -personal information and personal information, we regard the information used by combined as personal information.
Like most Internet services, we will automatically collect certain information and store them in the log file.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will automatically collect certain information and store it in the log file.

text: This type of information includes, Internet, protocols, (IP), address, browser type and language, Internet service provider, (ISP), referral/exit website and application software, operating system, date/time stamp, and click stream data.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will automatically collect the Internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and language, Internet service provider (ISP), referral/exit website and application software, operating system, date/time stamp, and click flow data.

text: We use these information to understand and analyze the trend, manage websites, understand user behavior on the website, improve our products and services, and collect the overall audience characteristics of the user base.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We use information to understand and analyze trends, manage websites, understand user behavior, improve products and services, and collect audience feature information.

text: "Daily Science and Technology" can use such information for our marketing and advertising services.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Daily Science and Technology can use such information for our marketing and advertising services.

text: In addition to Cookie, we will also use other similar technologies such as website beacons and pixel labels on the website.
For example, the email we send to you may contain a link to the URL of our website content.
If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your product or service preferences and improve customer service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you click the link we send, we will track this click to help us understand your preferences and improve customer service.

text: Website beacon is usually a transparent image embedded in a website or email.
With the pixel labels in emails, we can know whether the email has been opened.
If you don't want your activities to be tracked in this way, you can withdraw from our signal list at any time.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: If you don't want your activities to be tracked, you can withdraw from the letter list.

text: How do we protect your personal information
"Daily Science and Technology" attaches great importance to your personal information.

"Daily Science and Technology" online service (such as, icity, account system and cloud service), will use the transport layer security protocol, (TLS), and other encryption technology to protect your personal information during the transmission process.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use SSL and other technologies to protect your information during transmission.

text: When "Daily Science and Technology" stores your personal data, we will use a computer system with limited access rights, which are deployed in facilities that are protected by physical security measures.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: When "Daily Science and Technology" stores your personal data, we will use a computer system with limited access rights, which are deployed in facilities that are protected by physical security measures.

text: We will use encryption technology to ensure the confidentiality of the data;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will use encryption technology to ensure the confidentiality of data.

text: We will use a trusted protection mechanism to prevent data from being maliciously attacked;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will use a trusted protection mechanism to prevent data from being maliciously attacked.

text: We will deploy the access control mechanism to ensure that only authorized personnel can access personal information;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will deploy the access control mechanism to ensure that only authorized personnel can access personal information.

text: And we will organize safety and privacy protection training courses to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will organize safety and privacy protection training courses to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.

text: We will take all reasonable and feasible measures to ensure unrelated personal information.
label: Data Security

text: Unless you obtain your written license, we will retain your personal information for 36 months after you delete or cancel your account. After this period, we will anonymous processing or destroy your personal information.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: We will retain your personal information 36 months after you delete or log out your account, unless you get your written permission.

Important
Risk
rewrite: When you post some products, your personal information and content you share will be read, collected or used by other users.

Important

text: We strongly recommend that you do not send personal information in this way.
label: Important

Personal information about children
Our products, websites and services are mainly adults.

Important
rewrite: For the collection of minors' personal information with the consent of their parents, we will only use or publicly disclose this information when required by judicial or administrative agencies, with the explicit consent of parents or guardians, or when it is necessary to protect minors.

text: How can your personal information be transferred globally

The personal information we collected and generated in the People's Republic of China will be stored in the territory of the People's Republic of China without any personal information out of the country.
label: Data Retention
